p: In subsequent rounds, the co‐substrates used were inspired by the productive co‐substrates from the previous round, and screening was performed at increasingly low total product concentration (Figure 3c, middle and right). In round 2, reactions of the diazo substrate B1 with dihydropyran ( C1a), dihydronaphthalene ( C1b) or indene ( C1c) were found to be productive; whilst, in round 3, reactions of B1 with the substituted dihydropyran C1a’ or the chromene C1b’ were identified.
